-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."AuthorityMas"
(
    "Authorityid" character(3) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "AuthorityName" character varying(150) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Districtid" character(2) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    sign bytea,
    CONSTRAINT "AuthorityMas_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("Authorityid")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."DistrictMas"
(
    "Districtid" character(2) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "DistrictName" character varying(80) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "DistrictMas_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("Districtid")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tblloghis
(
    date date NOT NULL,
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    uid character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT tblloghis_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tbluser
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL,
    "Uid" character varying(20) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Pass" character varying(10) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Mobile" character varying(10) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    status boolean,
    "Authorityid" character(3) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    usertype character(1) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT tbluser_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tblweapon
(
    "UIN" character varying(18) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    weapon character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    bore character varying(20) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "weaponNo" character varying(20) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    ammunition character varying(10) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "uploadDate" date,
    CONSTRAINT tbluserback_pryk PRIMARY KEY ("UIN", "weaponNo")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tblweaponholder
(
    "licNo" character varying(30) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    name character varying(150) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    fname character varying(150) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    address character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    mobile character varying(13) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    area character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "licType" character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "UIN" character varying(18) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "imgUpdate" date,
    "printDate" date,
    "uploadDate" date,
    "issueDate" character varying(15) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "expiryDate" character varying(15) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    photo bytea,
    sign bytea,
    "AuthorityId" integer,
    status integer,
    CONSTRAINT tbluserdata_pk PRIMARY KEY ("UIN")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.tblweapon
    ADD CONSTRAINT tbluserback_pk FOREIGN KEY ("UIN")
    REFERENCES public.tblweaponholder ("UIN") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;

END;
